ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It is an overview of geology in a certain region of the world, followed by a trip to that region. I highly recomment it.
Fun class where you talk about a specific region and why its important geologically. I would recommend it to everyone
This is a fun and informative class if you are going on the field trip.
Great exposure to regional regional. A must have if going into the field.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course expanded my knowledge of alpine geology, but did not contribute to my dissertation research.
It didn't deepen my discipline or research, but it was a fun class in general.
This class gave me some insight into other areas of specialty within geology that I had not yet encountered.

Provided broad knowledge of all disciplines in geology so that conversing with colleagues is easier and exposed me to specific examples of well known geologic phenomena with real work examples from field settings.
